docs.text: there is a rule when it comes to movies .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: a sequel is never as good as the original .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there are very few exceptions to this rule , and texas chainsaw massacre : the next generation is not one of them .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: now if you also take into consideration that the original chainsaw massacre was a really bad movie , and that this isn't even the first sequel to it , you have a recipe for a very painful viewing experience .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: don't be fooled by the presence of up and coming talents matthew mcconaughey ( a time to kill ) and renee zellweger ( jerry maguire ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: they made this movie before they were stars .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: judging by their performances they also made it before they took any acting lessons .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's a wonder they ever worked in hollywood again after appearing in this turkey .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: apparently the producers of this film realized just how bad it was , because it sat unreleased for years until someone decided that they might be able to capitalize off the success of mcconaughey and zellweger .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: apparently the two young stars were none too happy about this thing ever seeing the light of day .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and i don't blame them , they would have been better off if this had been some sort of porno flick starring the two of them .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: unfortunately for them it is a horror film in which zellweger plays your typically stupid horror film character .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: while mcconaughey plays a guy who wears a mechanical brace on his leg that he controls with a television remote control .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: ( hey , don't say i didn't warn you . )
docs.label: negative

docs.text: to make matters worse , leatherface , the chainsaw wielding maniac , who was never the scariest of psychopathic killers at the best of times , has now become a full blown cross-dresser , and spends the entire movie in drag .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there is a plot to this movie but it isn't worth mentioning .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: let's just suffice to say that a group of teenagers are in the typical wrong place at the wrong time and are left to the mercy of remote control man ( mcconaughey ) and his lipstick wearing chainsaw revving half-witted sidekick .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: man , i can't get over just how bad this movie is .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: this film has absolutely no redeeming qualities .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: even the obligatory topless babe shot wasn't enough to hold my interest for more than 2 seconds .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the writing is bad , the direction is even worse , but both of those things look good in comparison to the acting .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: this is the sort of movie that they should make people in prison watch .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: a guarantee you , if criminals thought that they would be subjected to this film they would never break the law again .
docs.label: negative
